title: Day 999
content:
# Day 999

There is so much value in giving. It feels really good to help others. That's why Christmas is such an amazing holiday.

Tonight my Grandpa offered a beautiful prayer at dinner before the family ate beef stew. I even got some pistachio ice cream with chocolate chips for dessert. One of my personal favorites.

Since I will be traveling north for Christmas I decided to give my Grandparents gifts early. These gifts included 3D printed ones and they loved them. It's amazing that I can just make these little trinkets inside my home so easily thanks to Bambu Labs.

![Not the actual gifts I gave but close](https://miro.medium.com/1*ag8JWctuHLX-3EfDGiBhcg.png)

Feels good. Happy Holidays, Merry Christmas, Happy Hanukkah, Happy Kwanzaa, Happy New Year, and Festivus for the Rest of Us who enjoy Seinfeld.

![](https://miro.medium.com/0*rO59A4RBAKuuHFRZ.jpg)

I hope you have a blessed a joyful winter season anon.

12/15/24

Conor Jay Chepenik
